title: 05/21/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/21/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why we should expect this star studded NBA title contender to struggle in the postseason and why another team with championship hopes is likely to implode. Despite being a huge fan of LeBron James, he explains why it’s time for him to stop being so dramatic. He also believes this NFL player is clearly taking over the league and the face of a franchise despite not playing in almost a decade. Plus, new Hall of Fame inductee Chris Webber joins the show to preview the NBA playoffs before they officially begin. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
